name: ProSeed Handmade Cold-Pressed Organic Sunflower Seed Oil – Virgin & Unrefined Helianthus Annuus for Skin, Hair and Moisturizing – Rich in Vitamin E, Omega 6 & 9 – Amber Glass Bottle (4oz)
short_description: COLD-PRESSED & UNREFINED FOR PURITY: ProSeed Handmade Organic Sunflower Seed Oil is cold-pressed and unrefined, preserving its natural nutrients. This gentle extraction method retains Vitamin E, delivering a pure, virgin oil that is perfect for your skin, face, and hair care routine. Use this versatile, organic oil as part of your daily regimen for a natural addition to your beauty routine.

RICH IN VITAMIN E & OMEGA 6 & 9: This virgin sunflower seed oil is rich in Vitamin E and essential Omega 6 & 9 fatty acids, which help protect and nourish your skin and hair. These fatty acids help maintain hydration, making it a perfect addition to your daily skincare and haircare regimen. It’s suitable for use as a facial oil or body moisturizer.

NATURAL EXTRACTION FOR MAXIMUM PURITY: Our sunflower seed oil is carefully extracted without the use of heat or chemicals, ensuring a clean, hexane-free product. This method helps retain the oil’s natural nutrients, providing a pure and unrefined oil that offers the full benefits of its raw, organic ingredients.

HANDCRAFTED IN SMALL BATCHES FOR QUALITY: This organic, cold-pressed sunflower oil is artisan-crafted in small batches, ensuring each batch is freshly pressed and free from mass production processes. The small-batch method allows us to carefully control every step of production, helping to preserve the oil’s natural purity. By focusing on craftsmanship over quantity, we deliver a product crafted with care and attention to detail.

WOMAN-OWNED & EXPERTLY CRAFTED: Proudly a woman-owned business, ProSeed’s oils are crafted with care under the expertise of a certified aromatherapist and herbalist. Every bottle is carefully formulated to maintain the natural purity and quality of the oil, using methods that preserve its integrity. With a focus on holistic wellness, we’re committed to providing products that meet high standards, thoughtfully crafted for your skin and hair care needs.
product_description: ProSeed Handmade Organic Sunflower Seed Oil is cold-pressed, 100% pure, virgin, and unrefined to preserve its natural nutrients. Packaged in a 4oz amber glass bottle, the oil is protected from light, ensuring maximum freshness and preserving its potency. Ideal for moisturizing skin, nourishing hair, and crafting DIY skincare blends, it’s rich in linoleic acid, lightweight, non-greasy, and suitable for all skin types. Crafted in small batches with no heat or solvents, ProSeed oil offers a natural, holistic solution, made with care by a woman-owned business. Crafted with expertise by a NAHA- and AIA-certified aromatherapist and master herbalist, our sunflower oil is designed with care to nurture your overall well-being.

name: Iberia Extra Virgin Olive Oil & Sunflower Oil Blend, 51 Fl Oz
short_description: PREMIUM BLEND OF OILS: A perfect combination of extra virgin olive oil and sunflower oil, providing a smooth, balanced flavor for a variety of dishes.
HEART-HEALTHY BENEFITS: Rich in monounsaturated fats and vitamin E, this oil blend supports heart health and promotes overall well-being.
VERSATILE COOKING OIL: Ideal for sautéing, frying, grilling, drizzling over salads, or making homemade dressings and marinades.
NATURAL & PURE: Made from 100% pure extra virgin olive oil and sunflower oil, with no artificial additives or preservatives for a clean, natural taste.

51 OZ – IDEAL FOR FAMILIES AND FREQUENT COOKING: A great value for families, this 51 oz bottle provides a perfect balance of extra virgin olive oil and sunflower oil, perfect for everyday cooking and meals.
product_description: Iberia Extra Virgin Olive Oil & Sunflower Oil Blend combines the best of both worlds, offering a premium, heart-healthy oil perfect for a variety of cooking needs. With the rich flavor of extra virgin olive oil and the light texture of sunflower oil, this versatile blend is ideal for frying, sautéing, grilling, baking, and even dressing salads. Packed with vitamin E and healthy antioxidants, it provides a nutritious option for health-conscious individuals. Whether you're cooking family meals, preparing gourmet dishes, or creating homemade dressings, this non-GMO, pure blend is the perfect addition to your kitchen, delivering both quality and flavor with every use.

name: Safya - 100% Pure Sunflower Oil, (1 L) 33.8 Fl Oz
short_description: 100% Pure Sunflower Seed Oil, Premium Quality, Non-GMO
Safya Pure Sunflower Oil is a great all-purpose option for high cooking temperatures
Our Oil contains high proportion of Vitamin E and healthy polyunsaturated fatty acids
Healthy and Light Refined-wintered Oil provides the best taste to your table
Product of Turkey
product_description: Safya proudly represents the light and pure Turkish Sunflower Oil and brings the traditions and the posterity together. Safya sunflower oil is produced in fully integrated vegetable oil factory, which boosts the largest crushing capacity of Turkey, owned by Aves Oil. Right from the field up until the table, whole production process is automated with cutting edge hygiene standards. Owing to its quality and unique bottle design, Safya sunflower oil penetrated the market with extraordinary success. Safya is one of the largest producers of the sector in terms of export figures. Safya is produced to share the true taste of Anatolian cuisine with the entire world and hence it is produced in Turkey. With its high vitamin E content Safya, the healthy and light refined-wintered liquid sunflower oil containing polyunsaturated fatty acid, proudly gives the best taste for your tables.

name: Handcraft Blends USDA Organic Sunflower Oil - Cold-Pressed 16 Fl Oz - 100% Pure and Natural - Premium Grade Carrier Oil for Skin and Hair - Hair and Body - Massage - Hexane-Free
short_description: 100% PURE & NATURAL USDA ORGANIC SUNFLOWER OIL unfiltered, undiluted without any additives or fillers. Rich in vitamins, fatty acids and antioxidants, it is truly a wonder carrier oil. From skin care to hair care and way beyond, this amazing oil has endless uses.

COLD PRESSED USDA ORGANIC SUNFLOWER OIL FOR SKIN has a light texture and easily absorbs into the skin. It can be used to gently dislodge debris from deep within skin pores and follicles. It is also known for protecting skin against UV radiation damage and keeping skin soft and supple. A great natural skin moisturizer for dry skin.

BODY OIL FOR SMOOTHER SKIN is full of vitamin E and can help with signs of aging such as wrinkles, dark spots, fine lines and dark circles. It can help improve skin elasticity and result in softer and younger looking skin. The linoleic acid contained in sunflower oil can help skin retain moisture and stay hydrated for longer.

DILUTING ESSENTIAL OILS requires a carrier oil such as Sunflower Oil, Apricot Oil, Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, etc. Since essential oils are so potent, they must be diluted before being applied to the skin. Can be used as an aromatherapy carrier oil.

PURE USDA ORGANIC SUNFLOWER OIL FOR HAIR can help reduce hair loss and lessen hair breakages, thus improving hair growth. It is also calming for an itchy and dandruff prone scalp. In addition, it is a soothing massage oil and body oil. It is chemical free, hexane free, preservative free and cruelty free.

name: Cold-Pressed Raw Organic Sunflower Oil, Unrefined Non-GMO, No Preservatives, Pure Sunflower Seed Oil for Cooking & Dressings, 8.45 fl oz (250 ml)
short_description: COLD-PRESSED RAW SUNFLOWER OIL – Extracted using a traditional cold-press method to preserve the oil’s natural color, aroma, and flavor
ORGANIC & NON-GMO SUNFLOWER SEED OIL – Made from organically grown sunflower seeds with no genetic modification
UNREFINED & NO PRESERVATIVES – Free from chemical refining, additives, artificial ingredients, or preservatives
PURE SUNFLOWER OIL FOR COOKING – Ideal for salad dressings, dips, sauces, marinades, and finishing dishes
SMALL BATCH, PREMIUM QUALITY – Carefully produced and bottled in small batches to ensure freshness and consistency
product_description: This cold-pressed raw organic sunflower oil is made from high-quality organic sunflower seeds and extracted without heat or chemical processing. The unrefined cold-press method allows the oil to retain its natural appearance, aroma, and light flavor. Our pure sunflower seed oil contains no preservatives, additives, or artificial ingredients. Its clean, simple profile makes it a popular choice for everyday kitchen use, including salad dressings, sauces, marinades, and finishing oils. Packaged in a convenient 8.45 fl oz (250 ml) bottle, this organic, non-GMO sunflower oil is produced in small batches with attention to quality from seed selection through bottling.

name: PurO3 Ozonated Sunflower Oil – Pure, Natural, Organic Skincare for Face & Body – Oxygenated Healing Lotion, Moisturizer & Beauty Cream in a Glass Jar – O3 Therapy Salve, 2 oz
short_description: Advanced Cold Ozone Technology: Experience superior results with a fully ozonized oil made using PurO3’s innovative process, which delivers ultra-pure ozone without heat to preserve the natural properties of this nourishing organic sunflower oil

Ultra-Pure Ozone-Infused Sunflower Oil: The power of ozone from ultra-pure oxygen enhances the natural benefits of this high-strength, low-absorption certified organic sunflower oil, delivering soothing support for skin and nail irritations

Pure Nourishment, Free from Additives: Made with high quality, cold-pressed ingredients, our ozonized oil contains no fillers, GMOs, preservatives, or binders—just a natural, gentle skincare solution to revive and refresh your face and body

Fully Ozonated for Maximum Benefits: Unlike partially ozonated oils, our fully saturated ozonated sunflower oil features a thick honey-like liquid texture, deeply soothing and restoring dry, dull skin

Long-Lasting Freshness & Potency: Refrigerated before shipping for maximum freshness, this rich, restorative oil remains effective for up to ten years when stored cold and up to a year at room temperature, offering an extended shelf life

product_description: Bring good nutrition and a healthy dose of Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs) to the table with Flora Sunflower Oil. EFAs are needed by our bodies, but the body cannot make them on its own— they must be obtained from dietary sources. Omega-6 and Flora Sunflower Oil contains 9 g of omegas, including omega-9, per serving. On top of its health benefits, it brings a delicate flavor to everything from salad dressings to mayonnaise, stir-fried vegetables, and baking. ● Kosher + Non-GMO + Organic + Vegan *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
